launchpad_s_plus

Class Colors

  • java.lang.Object
    • launchpad_s_plus.Colors

  • public class Colors
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the Launchpad S specific MIDI velocity values used for output.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion
